title: CADA | UIC Today
contents: Skip to main content      Updated: May 01, 2020 at 11:42 AM         Today      Submit       Campus News  Academics & Research  Events  Resources   Current Student Resources  Faculty & Staff Resources  Photography/Video  Social Media Account Request Form  UIC Social Media Guidelines and Best Practices    COVID-19   Frequently Asked Questions  What you need to know about COVID-19  Support for the UIC community (COVID-19)  Teaching, learning and working resources  In the News: COVID-19    Contact   Communicating On Campus  Sending Announcements / DDDH  UIC Social Media Directory         All CADA       April 22, 2020  UIC’s Lydia Diamond wins Horton Foote Playwriting Award  The author of 12 plays says of UIC, “Our students inspire me daily”         June 17, 2019  UIC project helps CPS kids learn science through art, movement  A focus of the joint initiative is to create and disseminate an arts-enriched science learning model that can be adopted nationwide.         May 15, 2019  OMA/KOO win UIC’s Center for the Arts design competition  University and CADA officials are in the process of raising the construction budget through private and public funds.         May 3, 2019  Voters choose winner of Pop-Up Library contest  Juan Salgado wins with “Nomad” design
